posts.title: Treatment for Fleas
posts.body: Hello, kindly recommend the best treatment for fleas. They've invaded my chicken and goats. Bought delete and sprayed, it didnt kill all. ( There was once an outbreak and this did wonders but this time it  didnt) Doom powder poured all over....nothing... Paraffin + water spray....nothing Triatix spray....nothing What else can I use kindly? Note I noticed the neighbors dogs were the source, bought delete and doom powder for him to spray. But noticed last weekend they still had the fleas He claimed other stray dogs were the source.
